div.p: Plots of TONOS against hω for four different values of BE: (a) noise-free state, (b) ADN operates and (c) MLN operates. In these plots (i) BE = 25 meV, (ii) BE = 75 meV, (iii) BE = 125 meV and (iv) BE = 200 meV. (d) Plot of TONOS peak values vs BE: (i) noise-free state, (ii) ADN operates and (iii) MLN operates.
